questions.question: The main purpose of the Berlin Wall was to. . .

choices.answer: prevent people from Western Europe to travel to Eastern Europe.
keep people from  East Germany from fleeing communism.
keep people from leaving West Germany.
pressure West Berlin to give in to communism.

questions.question: Many Americans at first supported Castro's revolution in Cuba because. . .

choices.answer: he was fighting to keep Cuba from becoming a communist nation.
he had promised to join NATO once the revolution was over.
he was fighting against a ruthless dictator.
he had promised to end slavery in Cuba.

questions.question: The Bay of Pigs invasion was an attempt to. . .

choices.answer: have Cuban exiles help overthrow Castro.
keep the Soviet Union from bringing in nuclear missiles to Cuba.
have  Cuban spies assassinate US President Kennedy.
keep Cubans from fleeing to the United States.

questions.question: To help bring an end to the Cuban Missile Crisis, the US had to. . .

choices.answer: give up control of its military base in Cuba.
remove its military presence in Germany.
dismantle its nuclear missiles in Turkey.
give up control of West Berlin.

questions.question: To keep more nuclear missiles from reaching Cuba, the US. . .

choices.answer: bombed nuclear missile factories in the Soviet Union.
stopped all trade with Cuba and the Soviet Union.
blocked the Cuban coast with its navy and air force.
attacked Soviet ships that were transporting missiles to Cuba.
